meanings.definition: Capable of being divided into smaller parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The large plot of land was subdividable, allowing for multiple houses to be built on it.
meanings.sent2: The developer found the subdividable property perfect for creating a new neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so subdividable that everyone got a tiny slice!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail made her plan subdividable like a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The Lego set was subdividable, making it easy to build different structures.
